Sentencas: A process of pressurized gasification and power generation in a hybrid system of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) and gas turbine enables an efficient use of biomass.
Titulo: Steam reforming of tars at low temperature and elevated pressure for model tar component naphthalene

Sentencas: This process requires tar reforming in order to protect the SOFC from plugging.
Titulo: Steam reforming of tars at low temperature and elevated pressure for model tar component naphthalene

Sentencas: Tars must be converted at 5 bar absolute pressure (bara) while avoiding secondary steam reforming of methane in order to reduce the required heat input for the tar reformer.
Titulo: Steam reforming of tars at low temperature and elevated pressure for model tar component naphthalene

Sentencas: This can be realized at low reforming temperatures (<700 degrees C) where methane conversion is reduced due to chemical equilibrium.
Titulo: Steam reforming of tars at low temperature and elevated pressure for model tar component naphthalene

Sentencas: A laboratory-scale test rig is introduced, which enables an investigation of the steam reforming of the model tar component naphthalene at up to 5 bara.
Titulo: Steam reforming of tars at low temperature and elevated pressure for model tar component naphthalene

Sentencas: Deactivation of the nickel catalyst caused by coke formation was detected.
Titulo: Steam reforming of tars at low temperature and elevated pressure for model tar component naphthalene

Sentencas: Despite the reduced amount of free active centers on the catalyst surface, stationary naphthalene conversions are possible at temperatures between 600 degrees C and 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Steam reforming of tars at low temperature and elevated pressure for model tar component naphthalene

Sentencas: The lower the temperature, the more active centers are covered.
Titulo: Steam reforming of tars at low temperature and elevated pressure for model tar component naphthalene

Sentencas: For stationary conditions a hyperbolic approach for the reaction rate of steam reforming of naphthalene is developed and parameters for 650 degrees C and 700 degrees C are determined.
Titulo: Steam reforming of tars at low temperature and elevated pressure for model tar component naphthalene
